name: flowers forever cal 2025
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
**attention!** the cal starts on **october 7, 2025**. from this date onward, every week we will share a section of the pattern available in pdf format at katia.com. the instructions, available in english, spanish, french, dutch, german, and italian, also come with support videos.

available depending on your location:

* usa | https://www.katia.com/us/flowers-forever-cal-crochet-flowers-blanket-gp
* uk | https://www.katia.com/uk/kit-flowers-forever-cal-unico-crochet-flower-blanket-9726
* eu | https://www.katia.com/kit.php?idkit=9726&utm_source=katia&utm_medium=ravelry

designed by yvonne van zijl [bokkyshome](/people/bokkyshome) 2025

**terminology**: us terms
**skill level:** advanced
**finished size:** 50” (127 cm) x 58” (147 cm) (including the borders and after blocking)
**measurements in basic merino/merino classic:** 47 1/4" (120 cm) x 56 1/4" (143 cm) (including the borders and after blocking)

the hexagons, squares and border of this pattern are crocheted in the round.
the half and quarter flowers are crocheted in rows.
